title: The parable of the wycked mammon Compiled in the yere of our lorde .M.d.xxxvi. W.T.
author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
publisher: By Jhon daye, dwellyng in Sepulchres Paryshe at the signe of the Resurrectio[n], a litle aboue Holbourne Co[n]duit,
notes: Also issued as: A treatyse of the justification by faith only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
